h3.a: OMS, DSE Selected as CKH National Showcase Schools

div.div: Capturing Kids Hearts has been a part of our school culture for a decade and now two of our schools are nationally recognized for their hard work to focus on relationships first.

article.aria-label: News Item Titled Teachers, Students Back Together for Distance Learning

h3.a: Teachers, Students Back Together for Distance Learning

div.div: It’s a new way of teaching and learning, but teachers and students are still finding a way to connect while apart.

article.aria-label: News Item Titled Helping Health Care Workers

div.div: When in-person instruction at schools came to a halt, 3D printing seemed like a natural project for technology teacher Michael Miller to turn to, “I feel like I wanted to do something and this is something I can do.”
